name: Hidden Things Adventure
description:
Discover all the house secrets and where the objects are hidden – look behind the furniture, under the carpet, on the mantle, and discover all hidden objects while you do a home makeover! The real hidden adventure is waiting for you!

Features:
- 200+ objects!
- Amazing graphics!
- Catchy sounds!
- Hint system to help you!
- Excellent zoom option!
- 100 % free of charge!
